message.content:
cs.NE, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.CV, cs.SD

Reasoning: 
1. cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing) - This paper discusses the use of recurrent neural networks, which is a subfield of neural computing. 
2. cs.CL (Computation and Language) - Recurrent neural networks are commonly used in natural language processing tasks such as language modeling and machine translation, which fall under this sub-category. 
3. cs.LG (Machine Learning) - Recurrent neural networks are a type of machine learning algorithm and are commonly used in various tasks such as speech recognition and image captioning. 
4. cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) - Recurrent neural networks are also used in computer vision tasks such as object tracking, which falls under this sub-category. 
5. cs.SD (Sound) - Recurrent neural networks are also used in sound processing tasks such as speech recognition and music generation, which fall under this sub-category.
